review: This is FAST, I love the remote being controlled by blue  tooth. It works under covers, when people stand in your way, even from the other room. This is a quality remote that should last for years. I have had remotes in the past that buttons quite working rendering the device useless. Also the remote uses standard AAA batteries and amazon threw in the first set. The only complaint I can think of is that like almost all remotes it is black and almost impossible to find when laying on my couch, bet, etc. A Yellow Glo in the dark remote would be great.I never thought I would talk to a remote but this actually works to find movies, etc. In addition to amazon video I also use hulu and netflix apps. The voice search will find these apps but will not allow you to search with your voice while using the app. One must go back to old school navigation to move around to letters to search. The voice search would be great while using the apps. The absence of voice control using apps is my reason for giving 4 stars.I hope in the future to see this blend with my laptop so I can surf the net PIP style while watching TV.
